laboratory_examinations.findings: Did not pass the hearing screening.
A heterozygous de novo variant c.1498A>G (p.Ile500Val) in SMAD4 was identified, interpreted as pathogenic.
Normal hearing was shown despite initial hearing screening failing.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Evaluation for hearing loss performed at 23 months.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Cardiac structure and function evaluation by electrocardiography (ECG) and color Doppler echocardiography
